name: Medusa's Mini Mystery
description:
Medusa's Mini Mystery: Do or Donut!

A game by Marionette

Synopsys:

After waking up from a longer than expected nap, the hair snakes awaken to find one of them has taken a bite out of a donut their Medusa had gotten from her favourite bakery. Help Agnesss find out which one of her sisters are responsible, before Melissa wakes up and they all get in trouble over it!

A short point and click / visual novel with under 1000 words total as per the restrictions of the O2A2 2021 Game Jam;

  • Less than 1000 words!
  • 4.1 endings!
  • 1 Medusa
  • 6 snakes
  • Lots of fun! (Probably)
Credits:
  • Writing / Art / UI - Marionette
  • Music - KOU-G
Characters: Agnesss:

Melissa's self appointed detective apprentice, and the 'detective' in charge of this particular case.

Beatrisss:    

Watches too many cop shows and is constantly trying to prove how much of a Hard boiled 'tough-guy' she is. But is it a ruse to hide her true motives?

Casssie: 

     

Fashion loving snake. But does her fancy hat hide a darker secret?

Daisssy:      

Plays to the beat of her own drum. Is she really as oblivious as she lets on?

Elissse:      

The last line of defense standing between the world and the forces of evil. In her own mind at least. Perhaps her crimes aren't as imaginary as the evil she claims to fight?

Francesssca:  

1 snake, 0 f**ks. Acts too cool for your shenanigans, but is her ice cold demeanor a front to keep you from the truth?

Melissa:      

A Sleeping Medusa serving as collateral damage in this case (as well as the home/caretaker to the other snakes).

Donut:        

A delicious donut from Melissa's favourite Bakery. Taken from us in its prime. RIP.

Can you help Angesss solve the mystery of who took a bite of the Donut or will they all suffer the wrath of a Hangry Medusa when she awakens?
